argumentText:
ARGUMENT
g

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | grpinvfval.1 | |- X = ran G |
| 2 |  | grpinvfval.2 | |- U = ( GId ` G ) |
| 3 |  | grpinvfval.3 | |- N = ( inv ` G ) |
| 4 |  | #P_rnexg | |- ( G e. GrpOp -> ran G e. _V ) |
| 5 | 1, 4 | #P_syl5eqel | |- ( G e. GrpOp -> X e. _V ) |
| 6 |  | #P_mptexg | |- ( X e. _V -> ( x e. X |-> ( iota_ y e. X ( y G x ) = U ) ) e. _V ) |
| 7 | 5, 6 | #P_syl | |- ( G e. GrpOp -> ( x e. X |-> ( iota_ y e. X ( y G x ) = U ) ) e. _V ) |
| 8 |  | #P_rneq | |- ( g = G -> ran g = ran G ) |
| 9 | 8, 1 | #P_syl6eqr | |- ( g = G -> ran g = X ) |
| 10 |  | #P_oveq | |- ( g = G -> ( y g x ) = ( y G x ) ) |
| 11 |  | #P_fveq2 | |- ( g = G -> ( GId ` g ) = ( GId ` G ) ) |
| 12 | 11, 2 | #P_syl6eqr | |- ( g = G -> ( GId ` g ) = U ) |
| 13 | 10, 12 | #P_eqeq12d | |- ( g = G -> ( ( y g x ) = ( GId ` g ) <-> ( y G x ) = U ) ) |
| 14 | 9, 13 | #P_riotaeqbidv | |- ( g = G -> ( iota_ y e. ran g ( y g x ) = ( GId ` g ) ) = ( iota_ y e. X ( y G x ) = U ) ) |
| 15 | 9, 14 | #P_mpteq12dv | |- ( g = G -> ( x e. ran g |-> ( iota_ y e. ran g ( y g x ) = ( GId ` g ) ) ) = ( x e. X |-> ( iota_ y e. X ( y G x ) = U ) ) ) |
| 16 |  | #P_df-ginv | |- inv = ( g e. GrpOp |-> ( x e. ran g |-> ( iota_ y e. ran g ( y g x ) = ( GId ` g ) ) ) ) |
| 17 | 15, 16 | #P_fvmptg | |- ( ( G e. GrpOp /\ ( x e. X |-> ( iota_ y e. X ( y G x ) = U ) ) e. _V ) -> ( inv ` G ) = ( x e. X |-> ( iota_ y e. X ( y G x ) = U ) ) ) |
| 18 | 7, 17 | #P_mpdan | |- ( G e. GrpOp -> ( inv ` G ) = ( x e. X |-> ( iota_ y e. X ( y G x ) = U ) ) ) |
| 19 | 3, 18 | #P_syl5eq | |- ( G e. GrpOp -> N = ( x e. X |-> ( iota_ y e. X ( y G x ) = U ) ) ) |
